Name: TRUE SEEING
Components: V,S, M(anointment forthe eyes thatcosts 25 gp;ismade from mushroom powder, saffron,and fat;and isconsumed bythe spe11)
Description: This spe11gives the willing creature you touch the abilitytosee things as they actually are. For the duration, thecreature has truesight, notices secret doors hidden bymagic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, ali out toarange of 120 feet.
